EmailTemplate.description: Got the verbal? Great... now get the app!
EmailTemplate.name: Fleet - Application Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your WEX application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Attached you will find our fleet card application. This application is the first step in getting your fleet account up and running.
Please complete the application and email it to me at {!User.Email}. I will then submit it to our bank, WEX Bank, and we will have a decision on the application in the next 3-5 days.
I look forward to working with you to finalize the setup details as soon as your account is approved.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at {!User.Phone}.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
www.wexinc.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of Wright Express Corporation. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
Wright Express Corporation, 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
This is an advertisement from Wright Express Corporation. If you no longer wish to receive future email advertisements from {!User.Email}, email us to unsubscribe. Please be sure to include your name, company name and email address in the email.
